title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 17.8 - Reregistration and amendment of registration transactions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 17.8 - Reregistration and amendment of registration transactions

State Regulations

Upon any reregistration or amendment of a registration
where the registration has an expiration date in 1973 or thereafter, a
windshield validation sticker will be issued. This provision shall not apply to
a reregistration or an amendment of any registration for which a number plate
having the month or year of expiration embossed thereon or a number plate
having a plate validation sticker is proper. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
17.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
